医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现纯合性增加会对人类生育能力产生负面影响当谈到人类基因组的结构时，有害基因的出现只是时间问题；可能危及子孙后代的基因——；出现在人群中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Increased-homozygosity-leads-to-male-effects-on-fertility-in- human-population-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Increased-homozygosity-leads-to-male-effects-on-fertility-in- human-population-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=275a17e0-6098-4870-9845-d658620f2f10 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 22:10:02 -0400 Increased homozygosity leads to negative effects on fertility in human population, study finds
新的人工智能模型旨在修复基于智能手机的 COVID-19 X 射线诊断的缺陷研究人员强调了使用人工智能模型通过智能手机共享的胸部 X 光来诊断 COVID-19 的局限性和挑战。该研究引入了一种新的多任务学习模型，以提高诊断准确性，解决预测不稳定和图像中错误焦点区域等问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/New-AI-model-aims-to-fix-flaws-in-smartphone-based-COVID-19-X-ray-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/New-AI-model-aims-to-fix-flaws-in-smartphone-based-COVID-19-X-ray-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31e31bbb-3bae-4509-9c47-ca6d87b4f274 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 22:02:00 -0400 New AI model aims to fix flaws in smartphone-based COVID-19 X-ray diagnosis
链球菌如何智胜您的免疫系统以及为什么它对治疗很重要研究人员发现，A 族链球菌感染会改变免疫球蛋白 G (IgG) 稳态以逃避免疫系统，从而影响从局部感染到全身感染的转变。该研究还引起了人们对基于抗体的疗法有效性的担忧，因为细菌的毒力因子可以降解治疗抗体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/How-strep-bacteria-outsmart-your-immune-system-and-why-it-matters-for-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/How-strep-bacteria-outsmart-your-immune-system-and-why-it-matters-for-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27794b85-222a-404c-9​​a62-37c966599cc1 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 21:46:00 -0400 How strep bacteria outsmart your immune system and why it matters for treatment
水和消费品中的 PFAS 化学物质与甲状腺癌发病率上升有关《eBioMedicine》发表的研究表明，接触某些全氟烷基物质和多氟烷基物质 (PFAS) 会显着增加患甲状腺癌的风险。在各种 PFAS 中，线性 PFOS 及其衍生物被认为是有效的贡献者，这强调了大规模研究的必要性并强调了饮用水污染的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/PFAS-chemicals-in-water-and-consumer-goods-linked-to-rising-tropical-cancer-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/PFAS-chemicals-in-water-and-consumer-goods-linked-to-rising-tropical-cancer-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69afe369-4897-4966-8463-09d0ff3ecc13 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 21:37:00 -0400 PFAS chemicals in water and consumer goods linked to rising thyroid cancer rates
淀粉类蔬菜：必需营养素的重要载体最近发表在《营养前沿》上的观点强调了淀粉类蔬菜作为必需营养素的重要载体所发挥的独特作用https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Starchy-vegetables-A-vital-vehicle-for-essential- Nutritions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Starchy-vegetables-A-vital-vehicle-for-essential- Nutritions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=893795b4-7364-40b4-9985-8e4e5eb0bb7f Wed, 25 Oct 2023 21:32:32 -0400 Starchy vegetables: A vital vehicle for essential nutrients
研究人员确定膳食 omega 3 补充剂缓解肝脏状况的机制俄勒冈州立大学牵头的一项研究表明，为什么某些多不饱和脂肪酸能够对抗危险的肝脏疾病，为目前尚无 FDA 批准药物的疾病的药物研究开辟了新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Researchers-identify-mechanism-through-which-dietary-omega-3-supplements-alleviate-liver-condition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Researchers-identify-mechanism-through-which-dietary-omega-3-supplements-alleviate-liver-condition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebca46d4-e7b2-41c3-93a4-b9b74daadb15 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 21:17:43 -0400 Researchers identify mechanism through which dietary omega 3 supplements alleviate liver condition
新研究警告说，吃超加工食品会使您的肝脏面临风险研究发现，食用超加工食品 (UPF) 与非酒精性脂肪肝、肝硬化和严重肝脏疾病的风险增加之间存在显着联系。研究结果表明，减少 UPF 摄入量可能是增强肝脏健康和福祉的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Eating-ultra-processed-foods-puts-your-liver-at-risk-new-study-warns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Eating-ultra-processed-foods-puts-your-liver-at-risk-new-study-warns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f7db63b-5672-4f4c-b6b9-41a0e9816470 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 20:57:00 -0400 Eating ultra-processed foods puts your liver at risk, new study warns
COVID-19期间NF-κB的激活及其对高血压患者的影响研究人员回顾了 NF-κB 激活在 SARS-CoV-2 复制中的作用以及 COVID-19 药物对 NF-κB 激活的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/NF-cebaB-activation-during-COVID-19-and-its-impact-on-病人-with-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/NF-cebaB-activation-during-COVID-19-and-its-impact-on-病人-with-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e31fcddc-85af-461a-81fd-16de3a82c734 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 20:35:00 -0400 NF-κB activation during COVID-19 and its impact on patients with hypertension
研究挑战低出生体重与儿童神经发育问题之间的联系《美国医学会杂志精神病学》最近的一项研究使用孟德尔随机化来研究低出生体重与儿童神经发育问题之间的联系。研究发现，影响出生体重和后代神经发育的母体遗传因素之间没有因果关系，尽管一些证据表明胎儿遗传变异可能发挥有限的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Study-challenges-link- Between-low-birth-weight-and-childhood-neurodevelopmental-issues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Study-challenges-link- Between-low-birth-weight-and-childhood-neurodevelopmental-issues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cfb237b-4a6a-4aea-a16e-e3bb7e12f349 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 20:24:00 -0400 Study challenges link between low birth weight and childhood neurodevelopmental issues
研究揭示可卡因成瘾如何改变大脑的奖励系统罗格斯大学的研究人员利用神经影像学证明，可卡因成瘾会改变大脑的系统，以评估与我们的决定相关的各种结果的回报程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Study-sheds-light-on-how-cocaine-addiction-alters-brains-reward-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Study-sheds-light-on-how-cocaine-addiction-alters-brains-reward-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5262c9e-cc9c-42c7-8f56-5ae742fc3412 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 15:32:00 -0400 Study sheds light on how cocaine addiction alters brain's reward system
